captions.text: Hey, Galadriel.  You wanna know my secret identity?
You are Bruce Wayne of Gotham City.
Oh Dang.  I heard you can't see too hard to people.
You wish to take me on a date.
Well uh!  *clears throat*  I don't know.  I...
I was gonna see if you'd like to have dinner with me..
Or something... sure.
Because you are Batman.
Hehe... Yeah... so...
Would you like to have dinner some time?
You offer it to me freely?
Isn't that how dating works?
I take you out... we get to know each other..
I do not deny that my heart has greatly desired this.
Oh!  Okay.  Wow this is going pretty good so far.
In place of a dark knight you would have a QUEEN!
What the?!
Not dark but beautiful and Terrible as the Morn!
Treacherous as the SEAS!!!
Oohhkay!  Well this was a mistake.
I'm sorry.  It's not me it's you.
ALL SHALL LOVE ME!
Oh he's gone.
Heeeey Baby!

comments.author: a rahn

comments.text:
Batman... my man.. Galadriel's married. She's been married for a few 
thousand years now. Celeborn would be so pissed off with you hitting on his 
wife! xD

Come to think of it, Elrond would be pissed-off that you're hitting on his 
mother-in-law... and maybe King Elessar I (AKA Strider, AKA Thoronngil, AKA 
Aragorn AKA Guy with waaaay too many names) would too since Galadriel's his 
Grandmother-in-law.

Good luck fighting off Lothlorien, Rivendell and the Reunited Kingdoms of 
Arnor and Gondor. Oh and Gimli and his Dwarven colony in the Glittering 
Caves due to his crush on her. Hm... so you'd actually have most of 
Middle-Earth pissed at you. Then again it's fine... you are, after all 
Batman.﻿
